name: ForbiddenWord
description:
⊙Let the other person say the forbidden word!

⊙A psychological chat game that takes care of your own forbidden word and draws out the other player's forbidden words!

⊙The more you talk, the higher your score!
In the end, the person with the highest score wins, so you have to be careful about the other player's forbidden word and talk a lot.

but!

You can ask for an explanation if another player says something strange!
Click on the strange message to ask for an explanation.

⊙200% fun by creating your own character!
You can create your own character in the shop!
The first custom is free!

⊙ The forbidden word I set is the best!?
If you get a lot of referrals, your forbidden word will be posted on the best forbidden word. You can also see how other people have derived the kinks.
